job_tasks.phrase: Define success metrics for our models
job_tasks.justification: Defining success metrics directly relates to understanding how technical models align with business objectives and customer needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Build the underlying data infrastructure together with our engineering team
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions building data infrastructure, which is a core component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Create & evaluate forecasting & LLM models to drive those metrics
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation and evaluation of forecasting and LLM models, which falls under the 'Modeling' task category.

job_tasks.phrase: our first categorization & forecasting models for this
job_tasks.justification: Mentions existing categorization and forecasting models, indicating a focus on model development and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: Build internal tooling to customise models to new enterprise customers
job_tasks.justification: Building tooling to customize models implies software development efforts to create user-facing or internal applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Build infrastructure to monitor performance and act on it
job_tasks.justification: This describes setting up systems for monitoring model performance and taking action, which is a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with engineers, designers and founders
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with other technical and product roles is typical in software development projects to understand requirements and build solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: We are continuously iterating and exploring technologies as we go - so there's more to come!
job_tasks.justification: Highlights a dynamic environment where new technologies are explored and adopted.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore new technologies that improve all of the above.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the need to explore new technologies, indicating adaptability and continuous learning.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with engineers, designers and founders (they come from Fintech & Treasury!) to understand better what needs to be built and speak up when we are focusing on the wrong things
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes collaboration and communication to align on requirements and provide feedback.

job_tasks.phrase: speak up when we are focusing on the wrong things
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the need to critically evaluate and identify incorrect focuses, requiring problem-solving and pragmatic judgment.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll join as the first Data hire with a broad mandate
job_tasks.justification: Being the first data hire with a broad mandate suggests a need for ownership, initiative, and driving innovation in the data space.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with engineers, designers and founders
speak up when we are focusing on the wrong things
We are continuously iterating and exploring technologies as we go
speak up when we are focusing on the wrong things
first Data hire with a broad mandate

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes creating and evaluating 'forecasting & LLM models', alongside defining 'success metrics for our models'. While LLMs are mentioned, the primary focus appears to be on traditional forecasting models and broader data-driven metric definition and infrastructure building, aligning more with an ML Engineer's core responsibilities.
